TopicTitle: Can someone update and make BD FPS better?

Articles.Content: So BD armoury FPS is a great addon to BD armoury and its one of my all time favourite mods, but i feel its still lacking in the content and balance departments, so can someone please if possible update this mod?

Asking for updates to mods is kind of a no-no around here.

Also, if you were going to; the actual thread release page would be the place to do it.

If you are so interested, consider learning about modding and doing it yourself, content is difficult to make but balancing would be easy enough; just editing config files.
